| Rank | AI-Powered Service | GIF Idea | Reasoning | Additional Criteria |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 10 | AI-powered competitor analysis | A split screen comparing a client's website with competitors', with AI-generated insights and suggestions. | Showcases the ability of the AI to analyze and provide valuable insights on competitors, emphasizing the service's potential to help businesses make informed decisions and stay ahead. | Insightful |

User Personas for Target Companies:

| Rank | AI-Powered Service | Company Name | Target User Persona | Relevant Criteria |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | AI-driven website personalization | Trendy Tech Retailer | Sarah, E-commerce Manager, 35, focused on improving user experience and increasing sales conversion rates. | Tech-savvy, customer-centric, data-driven |
| 2 | AI chatbots and customer support | Fin-Support Bank | Jack, Customer Support Manager, 40, looking for ways to scale customer support without increasing costs. | Cost-conscious, efficiency-oriented, proactive |
| 3 | AI-generated content (copywriting, blogs) | Health and Wellness | Emily, Content Marketing Specialist, 28, wants to produce high-quality content consistently while saving time. | Creative, time-conscious, detail-oriented |
| 4 | AI-based conversion optimization | RealEstatePro | David, Digital Marketing Manager, 32, aims to maximize ROI on advertising by optimizing website design and UX. | Results-driven, analytical, ROI-focused |
